scripts.watch: npm run build && dotnet watch run -p ./Server/OpenOsp.Server.csproj --no-build
scripts.restore: npm ci && dotnet tool restore && dotnet paket restore && dotnet restore
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf ./*/obj/ && shx rm -rf ./*/bin/ && shx rm -rf ./{.paket,packages,paket-files} && shx rm -rf ./Client/node_modules && shx rm -rf ./Client/wwwroot/css/* && dotnet paket clear-cache && shx rm -rf ./node_modules
scripts.ef-add: dotnet tool restore && dotnet ef migrations add -p ./Server/OpenOsp.Server.csproj -o ./Data/Migrations
scripts.ef-remove: dotnet tool restore && dotnet ef migrations remove -p ./Server/OpenOsp.Server.csproj
scripts.ef-update: dotnet tool restore && dotnet ef database update -p ./Server/OpenOsp.Server.csproj
scripts.ef-drop: dotnet tool restore && dotnet ef database drop -p ./Server/OpenOsp.Server.csproj
